item.description:
Join us for a traditional 3-tiered afternoon tea at Upstairs on the Square in Harvard Square. We will be enjoying savory treats, sweet bites and tea! This will be a fun and relaxing time. Upstairs on the Square is known for its good food and delightful venue. Afternoon tea is $28 plus tax/tip. There is a $35 option which includes champagne for those who are interested.

Seating is limited for this event, so please only sign up if you can definitely attend. If your plans change, be sure to adjust your RSVP.

We look forward to seeing you for our Meet Up group's very first afternoon tea!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside entrance or at our table. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.why: We're going classy folks! Join us for a delicious afternoon tea at Upstairs on the Square, located in Harvard Square.
item.name: Afternoon Tea at Upstairs on the Square, Cambridge
